title: Data Engineering & Pipelines
description: Building scalable, cloud-based data infrastructure that transforms raw biological data into actionable insights. Expert in architecting automated pipelines for multi-omics data processing.

title: Bioinformatics & Genomics
description: 10+ years translating complex genomic and multi-omics datasets into biological understanding. Deep expertise in computational biology workflows and analysis strategies.

title: Self-Service Analytics
description: Creating intuitive tools that empower scientists to explore data independently. Specializing in democratizing access to complex datasets without requiring computational expertise.

title: Cross-Domain Leadership
description: Bridge builder between computational and biological teams. Expert at translating technical concepts for scientific audiences and scientific needs into technical requirements.

title: Technical Stack
description: Python, R, SQL, AWS/GCP, Docker, Nextflow/Snakemake, Git, API design, database architecture, and modern software engineering practices adapted for research environments.

title: Drug Discovery Systems
description: Building data infrastructure that accelerates biotech R&D. From target identification through preclinical development, implementing systems that scale with your science.
